dmca.title: [ABUSE] Abuse complaint
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of IPS Piracy
Department
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 2004 7:28 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [ABUSE] Abuse complaint

It has been brought to our attention that our software, Invision Power
Board 2.0, is being illegally distributed from your network. You should
be aware that such distribution is strictly prohibited in accordance
with our license agreement, which can be found at:
http://www.invisionboard.com/?license  Additionally, such activity
violates the Digital Copyright Millennium Act and consequently, we must
demand that you, within 48 hours of receipt of this notice, remove or
otherwise disable access to the content found at:
http://www.southsidedesigns.net/forum/index.php?showtopic=38

We believe that this is a very serious matter; therefore, we ask that
you provide confirmation that the aforementioned violation has ceased. 

Thank you for your prompt attention and cooperation regarding this matter. 


Sincerely,



Kimberly Throgmartin
Invision Power Services, Inc. - Piracy Division
http://www.invisionpower.com
